name: RoadTrip.app
body:
# Introducing RoadTrip.app

This will be updated soon, once the details are worked out.

## Development Story

Why make RoadTrip.app? Well, I was planning a cross-country trip and couldn't find an app that let me plan the trip how I wanted to. So I decided to make my own. Upon completion, I'll be releasing it for anyone to use.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Getting you from A to B with fun inbetween.
